examples: What do you need help with?: Where is my profile page?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Your Getting Started with Canva tutorial no longer works. It sends you to a page (not logged in) that asks for your phone number.

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello. I work with Hotmart Affiliates and I am setting up a sales page on Canva. However, when I insert a link and I will test the page, the message "You are about to leave Canva" appears and I was unable to attach it here, because it is on other pages and the chat program does not allow you to capture a screen from another tab. I see it on the Internet and other people are also complaining about this warning, because it gives the impression that it is a virus and thus we lose our sales. Please check it out? I really need to fix this, thank you!

Thank you
